===Overview===
Asano Robotics (アサノロボティクス) was a company formed by [[Yoshida Asano (Earth-616)|Yoshida Asano]] who was born shortly after the detonation of the Atomic Bomb on [[Hiroshima]], [[Japan]].

===Events===
As a result of the radiation, he was horribly disfigured. Yoshida swore revenge on Americans for the attack on Hiroshima and designed a powerful armor. When he found out that the late [[Howard Stark (Earth-616)|Howard Stark]] worked on the Manhattan Project, he swore revenge on his son, [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]. In their ensuing battle Yoshida appeared to have perished.{{r|Iron Man #257}}
